subject: p16043637
Findings: The heart size is mildly enlarged. Prosthetic aortic valve is again visualized. Sternal wires are seen. There is no focal infiltrate or effusion. There is some ill definition of the left heart border that could be due to rotation and fat pad, but a small underlying infiltrate cannot be excluded.
